        Returns:

      • updatePassword

        public Member updatePassword(java.lang.String email,

        Updates the password in the Member Table in the database for the given email address
        Parameters:
        email - email address of the entry to be updated
        password - password to be set
        Returns:
        the Member Table class of the entry updated or null if the entry was not found
